experience.title: Face Mask Detector for Covid-19
experience.description: •Used transfer learning to develop a human face mask detector for images/real-time video streams & achieved an accuracy of 95%•Developed CNN model with MobileNet V2 architecture as base model integrating with 2 FC layers and trained it using the open dataset•Used face recognition library to detect all the faces present and pre-trained model is utilized to classify each faces as with or without mask
experience.description_html: •Used transfer learning to develop a human face mask detector for images/real-time video streams & achieved an accuracy of 95%•Developed CNN model with MobileNet V2 architecture as base model integrating with 2 FC layers and trained it using the open dataset•Used face recognition library to detect all the faces present and pre-trained model is utilized to classify each faces as with or without mask <!---->

experience.title: Hall President
experience.description: • Elected by 390 boarders of the hall to voice their concerns and to represent their interest to the Institute's administration• Partnered with cab aggregators to provide improved conveyance to the final year students of MS Hall by initiating a shuttle service.• Responsible for functioning of the Hall and Discharge of all Hall activities and managing a total budget of 11+ Lakh rupees• Leading a team of 7 General Secretaries and 18 Secretaries to ensure active participation across various General Championship events• Accumulated INR 5+ Lakh from the Alumni to assist 50+ hall workers in the COVID 19 pandemic to provide them basic amenities

experience.company: Meghnad Saha Hall of Residence, Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur

experience.title: Business Development Intern
experience.description: • Worked on the diff. functionalities and features Psychometric Test, Carrier streams, topic wise tests, and Live video session with experts• Worked as a strategic planner and achieved a target of 2,500 active users in Punjab within a span of the first two months• Contacted various influential personalities of the local area and formed a supply chain with more than 500 booksellers
experience.description_html: • Worked on the diff. functionalities and features Psychometric Test, Carrier streams, topic wise tests, and Live video session with experts• Worked as a strategic planner and achieved a target of 2,500 active users in Punjab within a span of the first two months• Contacted various influential personalities of the local area and formed a supply chain with more than 500 booksellers <!---->

experience.title: Machine learning techniques for health monitoring of structures
experience.description: This project was part of my BTP work• To train a neural network to recognize the behavior of undamaged structure as well as of structure with various possible damaged states• When the trained network is subjected to the measured response, it should be able to detect any existing damage in the structure
experience.description_html: This project was part of my BTP work• To train a neural network to recognize the behavior of undamaged structure as well as of structure with various possible damaged states• When the trained network is subjected to the measured response, it should be able to detect any existing damage in the structure <!---->

experience.title: Core Team Member
experience.description: • Member of the Apex body that led a team of 18 Core Members, 20 Associate Members, and 60+ crew members over the 1,000 Peoples• Managed several events during the fest including participant entries to the final result, also managed guest lectures successfully• Published the advertisement modules to reach out to students of 150+ colleges in major cities & promoted events through social media
